TopicTitle: I have an idea for a forum game.

Articles.Content:
Okay, so I've got an idea for a forum game. It involves KSP. Player 1 takes a screenshot. Then, Player 2 tries to replicate that screenshot as best as they can. Player 3 then tries to replicate Player 2's screenshot. It goes on for 8 posts, and then someone else posts a screenshot.

The thing is, I'm not sure where to post it. You see, the forum games forum is in the off topic forum. But, the general KSP forum is just for stuff about KSP that doesn't go in other forums. I'm not sure about the challenges forum either.

Could anyone tell me where to post it?

(I also included a poll, to see whether people would actually play this game.)

Edited November 1, 2015 by PineCone
You can probably post this in general KSP, it seems to fit there quite well.

Forum games go in the Forum games sub section
